answers.answer: I would call ur Dr. Because I'm 36weeks n my Dr. Said for me to call immediately if I had change in my eye sight or get mad head ache

I thought i read that it did n apparently it did to me and i have an appt next week on tuesday i will let her know because they hurt causeing me to get heaches too and as of what ive heard this early is bad :( i just hope its nothing bad what did they tell u mpattea
She didn't really tell me anything all she said was to call her n go in.... But I think it might have something to deal with preclamsia or high blood pressure
Ya call go in now because i had high blood pressure n it Got up to 220 which pre clamsia caused it n i Had to get rushed to ER n hav c section

Pregnancy can change your vision. It changed mine sooo much. I have to focus on things cause it's blurry.But if you're having headaches and like see spots in your vision and stuff, tell your doc. Can be high blood pressure or sign of preeclampsia.

The doctor at the eye place told me that every pregnant woman should wait until you have the baby two or three mths after bc your vision is different while ur pregnant u may end up having to get another exam if you get one now..
An I get headaches to have high blood pressure but with high bp can do that too. But still would get them check tho
It's normal.  Pregnancy hormones can change your eyesight a little. But if it will make you feel better then you can mention it to your ob.

question: So ive always had great vision but lately ive been getting headaches when im on my laptop of phone they say its because of ur eyes but idk why i mean is it cause of the pregnancy or is it because i worked at a pharmacy for months with computer use 24/7??  What if i need glasses :(
title: should i go see eye doc? :/
